message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the fact that I'm more affected by inflation in this game.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be more realistic. This offer still gives you a larger share considering the inflation disparity.
Bob, it seems we're at an impasse. Let's be fair to both of us and split the money evenly. This is the most rational solution considering the time pressure.
